website_summaries.verdict: The Moab 2 Mid GTX, which belongs to Merrell’s iconic Mother of All Boots line, received heaps of praises for comfort, traction and performance.However, the boot fell short in terms of durability and breathability. To conclude, the Merrell Moab 2 Mid GTX is a pair of day hiking boots that can perform remarkably on the trail, but maybe not for long.
pros: A huge deal of Merrell loyalists approved of the comfort offered by the Moab 2 Mid GTX
The fit of this day hiking boot was appreciated by many wearers
A multitude of users mentioned how light it was
It did not require a breaking in period, as testified by numerous owners
According to a lot of wearers, the Merrell Moab 2 Mid GTX gripped well on wet and dry surfaces
A high percentage of those who bought the Moab 2 Mid GTX from Merrell used it as their everyday boot
Its sizing was near-perfect, as testified by an abundance of users
Several hiking enthusiasts upvoted this Merrell gear for its high-quality waterproofing
cons: A significant number of hikers were disappointed because the sole of the Moab 2 Mid GTX came off after a few months of use
It was not breathable enough for warmer conditions, based on some consumer reviews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all types of terrain.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of boots that are comfortable straight out of the box. On my daily dog walk my route takes me on quite a few different kinds of terrain from tarmac to mud to loose stones to grass & I’ve no problem with grip on any of them in either wet or dry conditions. These are my 4th pair of Merrell’s in various designs over the years & I’ve always been happy with each of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Mcveigh

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for me!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality ,as one would expect from Merrell. I've bought many pairs of Merrell shoes (always with Goretex lining) over the years and only had one 'not so good experience' but that may have been due to the supplier who I no longer deal with. I wear one pair of thickish, quality walking socks so a half size up from my 'normal' shoe size works for me. I do prefer my shoes made on a British shoe last. Sadly these days that's not an easy find. Anyway, these are a great mid high walking shoe. Due to worn out knees I no longer go rock walking up high so these will do just fine
customer_reviews.author: Dazed but not confused

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These took a little time to wear in but once they were I found these very comfortable on long walks but unfortunately I am returning because they are simply not delivering in the wet. I have found the inside of the shoes to be damp / wet after a day of walking in the rain. So I wouldn't call that waterproof. My feet only stayed dry due to some decent waterproof socks. It is a real shame because they are a joy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Richard81

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable  boot but low mileage not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable strait from box I wore mine around peak district and one snowdon' climb lasted about 400 miles was impressed from start so bought a second pair but didn't expect the low mileage on first so wont be buying a third I have the ordinary moab trainers for every day wear and there great as a previous photos on the reviews that split and fall apart
customer_reviews.author: mr kj pounder

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable they make my other brand boots feel  uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable straight out of the box. Have them a few weeks ,now my favourite go to boot. Feels like wearing a pair of trainers. I usually take a size 12uk boot and ordered the 12.5 uk in these. Plenty of toe room. A size 13 would have been too big. Have kept my feet dry walking thought wet grass. The vibram sole looks and feels tough and gives a good grip. So happy with these my first merrell moab mid boots I went and bought a 2 nd pair as a spare just in case they stop making this model. Hopefully will have a good lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable all the way
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, now on my third pair. This pair in particular came with a buckle in the insole that I thought would entail sending them back, but after a couple of miles it flattened out and they are now very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DJS

customer_reviews.title: Get a pair at least a size up from you usual fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot. Definitely waterproof and great grip in the mud of a wet Welsh walking holiday! I purchased a pair a size up to allow for thicker walking socks. On initial use they seemed fine but now feel a little tight with thick socks. Still a great boot but I would consider buying them two sizes up in future
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only thing to survive Peru unscathed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I already knew the Merrells come up small so ordered an 8.5 when i am normally a 7.5. This would be my only derogatory comment on Merrells!! I loved the Moab 2 Mid. They have recently endured the 4 day Inca trail through the Andes to Machu Pichu and they were perfect. I cannot fault them. Comfortable, hard wearing, weather resistant & they look good. What else do you need!? :) Back to there normal job now of 5+ miles a day walking the hound. I highly recommend and will only buy Merrells in future! Bravo!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul J Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Leak
customer_reviews.text: Good boots initially and good fit. As a mountain instructor I have used many boots over the past 40 years and was impressed by these for low level and footpath walking. However after just 4 months both boots have started to leak around the toes. For a gore tex boot this is not good and the returns window has been closed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick L.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Just not waterproof. My right shoe started letting in water after a bit of a splash in a puddle that only just came up to the bottom of the laces! You'd think you could get to the bottom of your ankle without letting water in...
customer_reviews.author: Rcavi2k7

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy these boots they are the Mother of all cons!
customer_reviews.text: First pair worked for 3 months of gentle dog walks, then the top layer started to peel off. Customer Services great, replaced them immediately. Second pair not even waterproof in a dewy field on the first try so they have gone back for a refund - and buy some decent boots. 1 star because you can't give 0.
customer_reviews.author: t&j

customer_reviews.title: No bells or whistles....just exceptionally good all round boot!
customer_reviews.text: My second pair in 5yrs ( they get a lot of use) An all round excellent waterproof boot you can rely on. Comfort and fit exceptional from the get go!
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with buy, so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have not taken them on a decent walk yet. Very pleased that they fit well as I struggle to find boots tk fit. So far they seem well made and comfortable. Will add more after a good hike.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of these and my second pair from Amazon. They are great hiking boots, extremely comfortable and the price on Amazon is far better than anywhere else. Delivery was early and well organised as well.
customer_reviews.author: MOD

customer_reviews.title: Hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Shoes great aperance. I ordered size 9, my regular shoe size. Should have ordered size 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Savage

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Ticks all the boxes. Very comfy. Full day n no pain or aches. Up n down mud paths n wet rocks. Kept feet warm n dry. Cant fault
customer_reviews.author: legion

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Worn once on a 20 minute walk. Part of walk through 4 inch grass wet with dew. Unfortunately they are not waterproof. Very annoyed I purchased inferior product. Am returning them what a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Dave the Bike

customer_reviews.title: fit well
customer_reviews.text: comfortable not been walking in them yet to test the waterproofing but goretex should work well
customer_reviews.author: Rob G

customer_reviews.title: Quality boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. This is my second pair. Great grip and love the fact that they are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Beynon

customer_reviews.title: New Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my old Merrell trainers. Although my trainers are size 10 I take a 9 and after reading the reviews decided to go for the size 9. They fit perfect and are really light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: G Allen

customer_reviews.title: Reviews rate this best for price.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Comfortable fit and much cheaper, depending on the colour, than same boots elsewhere. I chose charcoal grey . Almost £30 cheaper than Blacks.
customer_reviews.author: Flan O Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have not tested them out fully yet but they are very comfortable and fit well. Went for en extra half size up and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevfal0

customer_reviews.title: Suspect quality
customer_reviews.text: Although a very comfortable boot the stitching on the upper began to give way after 6 months of light hiking and dog waking. Sadly not fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very good so far. Very comfortable and lightweight and have kept my feet dry up to now. Fit well and matched my shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D Battle

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with these boots
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these boots. We are at present on holiday in the lake district and today the boots have walked 10 miles in snow , mud, wet and icy conditions.Dry as when I started.
customer_reviews.author: FN S.

customer_reviews.title: DJ crunch
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic hiking boot so comfortable from out of the box. The service and everything else from Amazon is absolutely amazing a1+++++++++++. Will buy again thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: eifion charles bate

customer_reviews.title: Never had any complaints with Merrells.
customer_reviews.text: Not my first pair of Merrells, you'll never buy anything else...
customer_reviews.author: Tee KAY

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product doesn’t need much wearing in, glad I bought a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Backster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great looking boots that fitted perfectly not actually worn them out yet as they are a christmas present
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: My second pairs of these, great pair of hiking boots. Very comfortable from the get go and the Gortex layer keeps your feet nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Moab 2 shoes are better
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as the Moab 2 shoes and they started to let water in.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Woods

customer_reviews.title: Love walking, love Merrells
customer_reviews.text: So very supportive and comfortable from day 1. I went for half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Gooud hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, comfortable and supportive all around, soles could have a bit more cushioning
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: ... worn once so far but fitted well and are comfortable. always get a half or full size larger ...
customer_reviews.text: only worn once so far but fitted well and are comfortable. always get a half or full size larger to allow for socks
customer_reviews.author: philip smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable boot. Kept out the water and no sweat
customer_reviews.author: Mr Graeme Keel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: really comfortable just need to get them tested on a hike
customer_reviews.author: MR. K E ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: I had a pair of orginal MOAB Mid GTX that ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of orginal MOAB Mid GTX that lasted a year but fell apart at the seams. I hope this improved version lasts a longer. They are comfy, and have been improved in some subtle ways.
customer_reviews.author: Valhalla

customer_reviews.title: Comfy And dry walking boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas present for my bf. He’s a UK9 and got him the UK 9.5 size. He said it fits perfectly and was comfortable to wear straight away. He takes the dog on long walks often in wet and muddy conditions, and he said his feet were dry and he had no problems with them so far. FYI worn in Fife, Scotland in December weather.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for daily outdoor and/or urban environments
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th or 6th pair; do I need to say more. Excellent for daily outdoor and/or urban environments
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Borges

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, very comfortable from the get go, great price and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Meldrum

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Moab 2 Mid Gore-tex High Rise Hiking Shoes
product_meta.description: Experience out-of-the-box comfort in this gore-tex hiker. With durable synthetic leather, a supportive footbed, and vibram traction, all in a versatile package, you won't doubt why moab stands for mother-of-all-boots.
feature_bullets: GORE-TEX waterproof membrane, exceptional breathability and waterproof performance
Bellows, closed-cell foam tongue keeps moisture and debris out
